subject: Medicine
title: What Placebos Cannot Do
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: What Placebos Cannot Do.

hook.text: Belief cannot shrink a tumor or mend a broken bone.

buildup.text: Placebos work best on subjective symptoms like pain and mood.

discovery.text: They change how you feel, not the underlying disease itself.

twist.text: A patient may feel better while their cancer keeps growing.

climax.text: This is why objective measurements matter in every trial.

punchline.text: Feeling better is not the same as being better.

quiz.question: What kind of symptoms do placebos affect most?
options: Subjective ones like pain and mood
